meanings: within the limits of the possible[possibility]

vlive.korean: 시험 범위야 뭐야? Is he studying for an exam or what? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 난 너를 믿었던 만큼 내 친구도 믿었기에 [가두리횟집] EP03

vlive.korean: 범위가 넓어지긴 하거든요? I mean of course my big hands help me pick up the chords. 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 호화롭게 기습라이브 시작🐶⭐️
vlive.english: I mean of course my big hands help me pick up the chords.

vlive.korean: 슈퍼 히어로가 되면 뭔가 할 수 있는 범위가 넓어지지 않을까? I think superheroes can do more! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] UP10TION X LieV - 업텐션의 눕방라이브!

vlive.korean: 바람 피지 마요 - 저희 팬들 범위가... Don't cheat on us. - We range our fans... 듣기 View video NCT : goodnight & good morning💚NEO CITY💚
vlive.english: Don't cheat on us. - We range our fans...

examples.korean: These forests cover a broad span of latitudes. 발음듣기 이들 숲은 아주 넓은 범위의 위도에 걸쳐 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These forests cover a broad span of latitudes. 발음

examples.korean: outside sb’s area of competence 발음듣기 …의 권한 범위를 넘어서는 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: outside sb’s area of competence 발음

examples.korean: She has a wide circle of friends. 발음듣기 그녀는 교제 범위가 넓다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has a wide circle of friends. 발음

examples.korean: Our powers are limited in scope. 발음듣기 우리의 힘[세력]은 범위가 한정적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our powers are limited in scope. 발음

examples.korean: This was outside the range of his experience. 발음듣기 이것은 그의 경험 범위 밖에 있는 일이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This was outside the range of his experience. 발음
